name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MailMuse: Gmail AI assistant and writing agent

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform Your Email Experience with AI-Powered Assistance

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your email game with MailMuse's AI-powered productivity tool

MailMuse features to supercharge your emails-
AI-Powered Email Generation: Simply input your desired message or brief, and let the AI handle the rest, producing well-structured and relevant emails.

Context-Aware Responses: Import your existing email conversations to provide the AI with context, ensuring responses are tailored to the ongoing discussion.

Personalized Writing Style: Train the AI to mimic your unique writing style using previous emails you've written.

Customization Options: Customize the tone and style of your emails to match your personal or professional preferences.
